definition: to, toward or at one side, (of movement) at an angle
details:
adverb
- to, toward or at one side
= synonyms: obliquely
- toward one side
= example: toward one side
= synonyms: sideward, sidewards, sideway, sidewise
- from the side
= synonyms: sideway, sidewise
- with one side forward or to the front
= example: with one side forward or to the front
= synonyms: sideway
adjective
- (of movement) at an angle
= synonyms: crabwise
